Comments.name: Line
Comments.description: Counts the number of line comments within a file. Does not include block comments that span a single line.

Declarations.name: Integers
Declarations.description: Counts the number of integer declarations within a file.

Controls.name: For Loops
Controls.description: Counts the number of for loops within a file. Capable of being combined with if statements for general looping complexity.

Controls.name: Semicolons
Controls.description: Counts the number of semicolons within a file. Useful for counting number of executable lines of code.
